text: hum ne dozakh ke daaroghe sirf farishte rakhe hai aur hum ne un ki tedaadh sirf kaafiro ki azmaayesh ke liye muqarrar ki hai, ta ke ahle kitaab yaqeen karle aur ahle imaan ke imaan mein izaafa ho jaaye aur ahle kitaab aur ahle imaan shak na kare aur jin ke dilo mein bimaari hai, wo aur kaafir kahe ke is bayaan se Allah ta’ala ki kya muraad hai? isi tarah Allah ta’ala jise chaahta hai gumraah karta hai aur jise chaahta hai hidaayath deta hai, tere rab ke lashkaro ko us ke siva koyi nahi jaanta, ye tawakkal bani aadam ke liye saraasar pandh wa nasihath hai
